name: Aung Paing Soe
intro: I explore how people and technology are making the world a better place
content: I'm a Back-End Web Developer skilled in Node.js, Express.js, PHP, and Laravel. I specialize in crafting robust APIs and scalable server-side applications. I can also create SPA applications using Vue.js and React.js. Additionally, I can develop full-stack applications using Next.js and Nuxt.js
